subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: In horse racing, although the rich guys usually win, every now and then fate smiles on the little guy, as it has done with Jean-Pierre Gauvin and his colt Saonois, a favorite in the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe.
snippet: In horse racing, although the rich guys usually win, every now and then fate smiles on the little guy, as it has done with Jean-Pierre Gauvin and his colt Saonois, a favorite in the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe.
